title: Is there a way to receive an email when a new blog post is published? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, that is very simple. Simply install a plugin name is Jet Pack and when someone user subscribed your jetpack subscription form widget so they will be added or listed in WordPress email database which will be associate to your web domain. Now what will happen is, when you publish any article anytime then this article will be automatically emailed to your all subscribers, you don’t need to do anything manually to broadcast these emails. That’s all.

Yes, and its called a Feed. You can simply subscribe ( almost every blog/website has a feed subscription option available) to other blogs and if you want your blog to have such feed, you can use Mailchip, Feedburner RSS and there are plenty other options too. Cheers!
You can get an alert on in your mail about a new blogpost if you have subscribed to that blog by registering your email address.
Yes you can receive update by subscribbing to feeds and if you have blog you can use feed burner to send update to your blog reader as well.
Yep, that is why all good blogs have a signup popping up or appearing on the side of the blogsite. :)
